name: New Potato Salad With Sun-Dried Tomatoes
keywords: herbs, new potatoes, sun-dried tomato, side dish, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds small new potatoes, well scrubbed
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the potatoes until just tender. Quarter them and place in a bowl. Sprinkle with oil, vinegar and slivered sun-dried tomatoes.
Season potatoes to taste with salt and pepper (taste carefully because the tomatoes are salty). Add the herbs.
Carefully fold in the mayonnaise. Check seasonings and serve slightly warm or chilled.
